solution_line_template: Hana sold 4/7 of her collection for ${earned_amount}, so 1/7 of her collection represents: {earned_amount}/{numerator_of_fraction_sold} = $<<{earned_amount}/{numerator_of_fraction_sold}={value_of_one_seventh}>>{value_of_one_seventh}.

And as a result, the entire collection represents: {value_of_one_seventh} * {denominator_of_fraction_sold} = $<<{value_of_one_seventh}*{denominator_of_fraction_sold}={total_collection_value}>>{total_collection_value}.
